property.stylesheets.vm:
<script type="text/javascript"> //<![CDATA[ var ejcLoc = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://"+document.location.host+"/xwiki/skins/curriki20/extjs/" : "http://extjs.cachefly.net/ext-2.3.0/"); document.write(unescape("%3Clink rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='" + ejcLoc + "resources/css/ext-all.css' /%3E")); //]]> </script> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("style.css", true)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" /> ## If we're in print view enable the print CSS so that it's applied in view mode #** * Curriki Specific *# <link href="/xwiki/js/curriki-js.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/ictcrs.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("panels.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/addpath.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/filetypes.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/search.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> ##we should not need that one ##<link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/style2.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("sankore.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("js/yui/treeview/assets/tree.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> ## ext-js script taken from here
#if($doc.getObject("CurrikiCode.AssetClass")) ##<link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/views.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> #if("$!request.viewer"=="embed") <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/embed.css", false)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> #end #end #if("$!request.viewer"=="print") <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/print.css", true)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" /> #end ## IE specific stylesheets #if($response.getHeader("user-agent").contains("MSIE")) <!--[if IE]> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("ie-all.css", true)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("curriki/ie.css")" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" title="default" /> <![endif]--> <!--[if IE 6]> <link href="$xwiki.getSkinFile("ie-6.css", true)" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <![endif]--> #end ## Hook for inserting CSS skin extensions <!-- com.xpn.xwiki.plugin.skinx.CssSkinExtensionPlugin --> <!-- com.xpn.xwiki.plugin.skinx.CssSkinFileExtensionPlugin -->
